name: HELMS EXPRESS v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (LEMONDS), Appellants
name_abbreviation: Express v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: HELMS EXPRESS v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (LEMONDS), Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Neil J. Rovner, Richard C. Angino, Harrisburg, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
548 A.2d 252
HELMS EXPRESS v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (LEMONDS), Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1988.
Decided Oct. 20, 1988.
Neil J. Rovner, Richard C. Angino, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Arthur Leonard, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
